name: Razor
title: Wolf Boy
description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

charged.1: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
charged.2: At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his lupical.
description.3: Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to opponents in front of Razor.
description.4: Upon striking an opponent, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate.
description.5: Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration.
description.8: Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive <electro>Electro DMG</electro>, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils.
description.9: Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.
description.11: In the moment when lightning strikes, you can sometimes glimpse the look of a predator sizing up his prey deep within Razor's eyes.

description.0: Summons the Wolf Within, which deals <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils, which will be converted into Elemental Energy for him.
description.1: The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's duration.
4: Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.
Raises Razor's ATK SPD and <electro>Electro RES</electro>.
Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the <electro>Electro-Charged</electro> status.
description.6: These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield.
description.7: When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill.
description.9: The wolf has awoken. The hunt is on.

description.1: Using Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.

description.0: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
description.1: Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

description.0: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.
Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.
Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3.
When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.
Increases the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3.
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.
description.1: When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.
